title.rendered: UGREEN USB C to Lightning Cable MFi Certified Lightning Type C PD Fast Charger Data Lead Compatible with iPhone 12 11…

content.rendered:
UGREEN USB C to Lightning PD Fast Charging Cable for iPhone 12 Pro Max/12 Mini/11 Pro Max/8 Plus

Charge In A Flash

* For iPhone–The MFi Lightning to USB C Power Delivery Cable helps PD quick charging to PD-enabled iPhones, like iPhone 12 Pro/12 Mini/SE 2020/11 Pro Max/8 Plus. The USB-C PD Fast Charger powers up new iPhones in much less time. Only take 30mins to ship 50% charging to iPhone 11, 2.5x sooner than the unique 5W charger cable.

* For iPad–The Type C Lightning PD Cable outputs max 45W(15V/3A)and delivers full-speed quick charging to iPad Pro 2017(30W), iPad Air 3(30W), iPad Mini 5(25W) when paired with PD 30W/45W/61W/65W/87W energy adapter.

Super Fast Data Syncing

The Lightning to USB-C Cable creates a handy and speedy knowledge bridge between iPhone and Type C/Thunderbolt 3 laptops & desktops(like MacE-book Air 2020, Mac Pro, iMac). With 480Mbps super-fast knowledge switch charge, you’ll be able to add massive information, movies, images from iPhone to MacE-book rapidly.

Concern What You Care

* MFi licensed Chip–The iPhone to USB C PD Cable adopts real Apple chipset(UPC/EAN:6957303814930) to preserve protected & secure charging and guarantee full compatibility with new iOS with out error message pop up.

* C94 Lightning Connector–With C94 Lightning connector, PD quick charging can notice on the brand new PD-enabled iPhone & iPad.

* Double Certifications–The USB Type C to iPhone Charger Cable not solely will get Apple MFi licensed however will get USB Power Delivery Fast Charge licensed. Greatly guarantee quick charging.

* Robust Construction–The Lightning to Thunderbolt 3 Cable combines 21AWG tinned core with Multi-layer strong shielding(TPE Jacket, Metal Braid, Aluminium Foli),and options bolstered wire joints to stop bending & splitting points.

(*3*)

Read more

Fit All Apple Lightning Devices

The USB Type C to Lightning Fast Charge Cable works flawlessly with any Apple Lightning units, even of newer iOS programs, together with:

* USB PD Fast Charge:

iPhone 12 Pro Max / 12 Pro / 12 Mini / 12 / 11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max / XS Max / XS / XR / X / 8 / 8 Plus / SE2 2020;

2017 iPad Pro 12.9″ / 10.5″, iPad Air 3 10.5″, iPad Mini 5 7.9″, New Airpods Pro;

* Non-PD Fast Charge:

iPhone 7 / 7 Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / 6S / 6S Plus, Phone 5, 5s, 5c, 5s

iPad 4, iPad 5, iPad Air 2, iPad Air 2, iPad Mini 4, iPad Mini 3, iPad Mini 2, iPad Mini retina, iPad Pro

iPod Nano 7, iPod Touch 7, iPod Touch 6, iPod Touch 5

*USB C Connector

PD18W/PD20W/PD30W/PD45W/PD61W/PD65/PD87W/90W/96W Power Adapter/Power Bank

USB-C/Thunderbolt 3 laptop computer/desktop, like MacE-book Pro 2019, MacE-book Air 2020, MacE-book 12″, iMac, Dell XPS 15/13.

USB C port on automotive;

480Mbps Data Transfer

The USB C Lightning Data Cable supports files transmission between iPhone and MacBook. Handy to back up files.

Superior Durability

Soft cable makes it easy to roll up this Type C iPhone Cable for tidy storage and convenient to carry around.

Original MFi Certified Chip

UGREEN USB C to Lightning cable made from original Apple chips provides a secure and stable voltage.

Read more

Frequently Asked Questions

Q1： Is this Apple authenticated cable?

  • Yes, UGREEN USB C to Lightning Cable is authenticated by MFi program.
  • UPC / EAN : 6957303814930
  • Model : 10493

Q2： Would this cable works with 18W USB-C PD charger?

  • Yes, you will be able to use this cable with your existing USB-C Power Delivery chargers such as PD 18W, 20W, 30W, 36W, 45W, 61W, 65W, 87W or 96W.

Q3： Does this cable support PD fast charge for my iPhone 11?

  • Yes, the USB-C Lighting Cable supports PD Fast Charge up to 36W 12V/3A (max) for 2017 iPad Pro 10.5″/12.9″, iPad Air 3 10.5″, iPad Mini 5 7.9″, New Airpods Pro, iPhone 12 Mini / 12 Pro Max / 12 Pro / 12 /11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max / XS Max / XS / XR / X / 8 Plus / 8 / SE 2020 and the latest model.

Q4: Does this cable support old iPhone like iPhone 7?

  • Yes, this USB C to Lightning Cable also supports standard 5V 2A/2.4A charging to old iPhone 7/7 Plus/6S/6 Plus/5/SE.

Q5: Does this cable support data transfer?

  • Yes, the Lighting to Type C Cable supports data transfer between iPhone and USB C/Thunderbolt 3 laptop/desktop. For example, you can use this cable to transfer file between your iPhone 11/SE 2020 and MacBook Pro.

(*8*) (*12*) (*11*)
PD 20W USB C Fast Charger 2 Pack 20W PD 3.0 USB C Charger PD 18W USB C Fast Charger 65W GaN USB-C PD Charger Plug 36W USB-C PD QC 3.0 Wall Charger USB C to Lightning PD Cable
Connector USB C PD 3.0 & QC 4.0 PD 3.0, QC 3.0 USB C PD 3.0 & QC 4.0 USB C USB C to USB C USB C to Lightning
Max Power 20W 20W 18W 65W 36W 20W

MFi Certified: UGREEN USB C to Lightning Cable licensed by MFi prices USB Power Delivery enabled lightning IOS units twice sooner than the unique energy cables,when paired with PD 18W, 30W, 45W, 61W, 65W, 87W, 96W USB-C Power Adapter or PD-enabled Power Bank .Specifically, this MFi Lightning USB-C PD Cable delivers 18W quick charging to iPhone SE 2020/11 Pro Max/11 Pro/11/XR/XS Max/8 Plus/8, 2017 iPad Pro 12.9″/10.5″, iPad Air 3 10.5, iPad Mini 5 7.9.
PD Fast-Charge: A brand new “C94 Lightning connector” is utilized for supporting PD 18W, 30W, 36W, 45W, 61W, 65W or 87W units. UGREEN USB C to Lightning cable adopts MFi Certified C94 (PD Quick-Charge) to ship speedy cost up to 3A (max). UGREEN USB C to Lightning Lead prices iPhone X from 0% to 50% in 30 minutes, virtually 2.5X sooner than the common 1A charger.
Durable and Secure: UGREEN Lightning to USB Type C Cable options authentic chip to guarantee a very compatibility with iOS system, no pop-up message. Built-in overvoltage safety, battery protector and automated chip recognition features shield your iPhone/iPad properly from damages. 21AWG bronze tinned core, silver-plated connector, and 0.8mm thickness bolstered joints outdoors. Especially, The iPhone iPad to USB C Cable passes 15 000 bending checks, long-lasting and sturdy.
Widely Compatible: The MFi Lightning to USB Type C Lead is suitable with new iOS and works flawlessly with any Apple lighting units. It helps 20W PD quick charging to iPhone 12/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/SE 2020/11 Pro Max/11 Pro/11/XR/XS/XS Max/X/8 Plus/8, 30W 3A PD quick cost to 2017 12.9/11 iPad Pro /iPad Air 3/iPad mini 5, customary 5V 2A/2.4A charging to iPhone 7 Plus/7/6s/6s Plus/6/5s/SE, and 5V 1A charging for iPod. (Warm Tips: Only iPhone 8 and the newer iPhone help PD rapid-charge.)
Multi-Function Cable: With this Lightning to USB C cable, you cannot solely use a PD Power Adapter but in addition laptop computer/energy financial institution/automotive to recharge your iPhone. The USB C Cable additionally helps knowledge switch between iPhone and USB-C/Thunderbolt 3 laptop computer or desktop, like transferring information between iPhone 11 and MacE-book Pro. Max knowledge switch charge up to 480Mbps, 1G massive information completed in 25s. Perfect alternative to benefit from quick charging with present USB-C PD charger to your units
